summary.span: 提供用于选择 XML 数据文件的设计时用户界面。

span.span: Provides a design-time user interface for selecting an XML data file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象用于在设计时选择和编辑 XML 数据文件 (.xml) 的 URL，然后将 URL 分配给控件属性。An object is used at design time to select and edit a URL for an XML data file (.xml), and then assign the URL to a control property. 例如，控件使用类在设计时设置的值属性。For example, the control uses the class at design time to set the value of the property. 使用特性将相关联具有属性。Use the attribute to associate the with a property. 设计器宿主关联的属性在设计图面上编辑，当调用方法。When the associated property is edited on the design surface, the designer host calls the method. 方法使用方法，也不能反过来显示用户界面，用于选择 URL，然后返回由用户选择的 URL。The method uses the method, which in turn displays a user interface for selecting the URL, and then returns the URL that is selected by the user. 方法指示的用户界面的显示样式。The method indicates the display style of the user interface. 从派生类来定义 XML 数据属性的自定义编辑器。Derive a class from the to define a custom editor for an XML data property. 例如，派生的类可以重写方法，，然后调用具有自定义方法或值。For example, a derived class can override the method, and then call the method with a custom or value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何关联的实例具有自定义控件内包含的属性类。The following code example demonstrates how to associate an instance of the class with a property that is contained within a custom control. 当在设计图面上编辑控件属性类提供的用户界面，可选择和编辑 XML 文件名称的属性值。When the control property is edited on the design surface, the class provides the user interface to select and edit an XML file name for the property value. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性由方法调用时方法，用于在设计时向用户显示 URL 选择对话框。The property is used by the method when calling the method, which displays the URL selection dialog box to the user at design time. 属性默认值，指示两个 URL 筛选器对话框中： 一个用于 XML 数据文件 (\*.xml)，另一个用于所有文件 (\*。\*)。The property default value indicates two URL filters for the dialog box: one for XML data files (\*.xml) and another for all files (\*.\*). 筛选器字符串包含一个或多个筛选器选项。A filter string contains one or more filter options. 每个筛选器选项包含说明的筛选器，跟垂直条 (|) 和筛选器模式。Each filter option contains a description of the filter, followed by the vertical bar (|) and the filter pattern. 由竖线分隔的字符串不同筛选选项。The strings for different filtering options are separated by the vertical bar. 下面是一个包含两个筛选器选项的筛选器字符串的示例：The following is an example of a filter string that contains two filter options: "`XML Files (*.xml)|*.xml|All Files (*.*)|*.*`"."`XML Files (*.xml)|*.xml|All Files (*.*)|*.*`". 通过用分号分隔的筛选器模式，可以在筛选器选项中指定多个筛选器模式。You can specify several filter patterns in a filter option by separating the filter patterns with semicolons. 下面是筛选器字符串，其中第一个筛选器选项指定两个筛选器模式的示例：The following is an example of a filter string in which the first filter option specifies two filter patterns: "`Custom XML Files (*.xd1; *.xd2)|*.xd1;*.xd2|All Files (*.*)|*.*`"."`Custom XML Files (*.xd1; *.xd2)|*.xd1;*.xd2|All Files (*.*)|*.*`".
